description: a(n)-th prime is sum of first k primes for some k.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2500
mathematica: PrimePi /@ Select[ FoldList[Plus, 0, Prime@ Range@450], PrimeQ@# &] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ Sep 28 2006 *)PrimePi/@Select[Accumulate[Prime[Range[500]]],PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 05 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Renaud Lifchitz (100637.64(AT)CompuServe.COM), _David W. Wilson_
